Vijayalakshmi wrote:

> HI!
> 
> I'm very new to JUnit.Should we write testcase for each and 
> everymethod.

You should look at the JUnit FAQ (use Google to find it). It answers 
this question, as well as others.

 > Suppose, we have 20 methods in a particular class.Is it
> necessary to write all the 20 test cases.then,it will become one small 
> JUnit project again.

It is only necessary to test the code you wish to work. It is only 
necessary to write as many tests as it takes to give you enough 
confidence to change your code.
